name: Heretic Rage
description:
Take the role of a demonic priest who can convert enemies into mindless followers.

Controls:

  • WSAD to move.
  • Hold left mouse button over an enemy soldier to convert him.
  • Press Q to order your followers attack an enemy.
  • Press E to release Rage.

Heretic Rage was developed in 48 hours as part of PolyJam 2018. 

Credits:

Graphics: Piotr Szekalski

3D Animations:  Michał Dąbrowski
